feed.title: Combined summary - Weekly developer meetings over holidays

entry.title: Combined summary - Weekly developer meetings over holidays
entry.summary: There are two weekly developer meetings scheduled for December 24th (Christmas Eve) and December 31st (New Year's Eve). Wladimir, who sent the message, believes that most people may find these meeting dates inconvenient due to the holidays. He suggests taking a break from the meetings for two weeks and resuming on January 7th. This will give everyone time to enjoy the holidays without having to worry about attending the meetings.Wladimir's suggestion seems to be a reasonable one as many people may have plans with their families or friends during the holidays. Taking a break from the meetings will allow everyone to recharge and come back refreshed in the new year. It is important for everyone involved to be able to take some time off and enjoy the festivities without any added stress.The decision to take a hiatus from the meetings and resume on January 7th will provide an opportunity for everyone to start fresh in the new year. It will also ensure that everyone can attend the meetings without any distractions or conflicts. The message highlights the importance of work-life balance and taking time off when necessary, especially during the holiday season.Overall, the suggestion to take a two-week break from the meetings due to the holidays seems like a sensible option. It will allow everyone to enjoy the festive season without any added pressure or stress.
